Who We Are

We consider ourselves professional problem solvers first and foremost and are translators between the worlds of Tech, Product, and Business. We are passionate technologists, entrepreneurs and UX architects – and we will never stop learning and challenging our craft.

MEET THE TEAM

  • Developer, UX engineer and product strategist who builds and scales products that people love to use. Strives for great UX, exceptional usability and visual design.

    • AR & Ambient Computing
    • Mobile Engineering
    • Machine Learning

  • Experienced language-agnostic software engineer creating tested and maintainable software in agile collaborative environments.

    • Serverless Infrastructure
    • Machine Learning
    • Augmented Reality

  • Passionate tech enthusiast, poly-skilled developer, strong believer in open source and fascinated by programming, IoT, Machine Learning and Big Data.

    • Machine Learning
    • Big Data
    • IoT

  • Entrepreneurial, technological, freethinking software engineer and dedicated problem solver with a love for high-performance and scalable software. Sees technology as a tool to unlock opportunities.

    • Robotics & AI
    • Languages & Compilers
    • Machine Learning

  • Experienced digital product designer with a focus on interaction design patterns and data-driven problem solving. Practices iterative design and strives for maximum product development efficiency.

    • User Experience
    • Feedback Loops & User Research
    • Data-driven Problem Solving

  • Leading Machine Learning and Data Science Expert. Loves to build Artificial Intelligence based innovative and disruptive solutions.

    • Deep Learning Algorithms
    • Blockchain
    • IoT

  • Enjoys dogs and digital marketing, in that order. Passionate about Blockchain and crypto technologies and economics.

    • Digital Marketing
    • Game Theory
    • Blockchain Token Economics

  • We're fortunate to work with a large network of acclaimed industry experts that focus on areas like Security, Blockchain/Ethereum, and IoT.

Alumni

We’ve previously been employed by some amazing companies.

How We Work

We are a close-knit team of colleagues and friends working on products we love. We believe great teams develop trust and confidence in each other through strong personal relationships.

What We Value

Our team is founded on common goals and values, and we strive to reflect these in our daily work.

  1. Lifelong learning & Mentoring

    Learning from and mentoring each other ensures we continuously grow stronger as individuals as well as a team.

  2. Craftsmanship

    Having true passion for our craft sets a standard to aim for as a team. We see the beauty in true craftsmanship.

  3. Honest Communication

    Productive partnerships are built on strong communication, where empathy and honesty is key.

  4. New technologies

    We don't have a go-to stack and are always on the hunt for new technologies to add to our utility belt.

  5. Zero HIERARCHY

    Confidence without attitude. Everyone in our team is a multidisciplinary problem solver who deserves to be heard.

  6. Humility & Curiosity

    Every day we seek to challenge ourselves to continually improve as a collective and as individuals.
